Elements.Body: Do you have anything going on today? Plans with my friends fell through...was wondering if you’d be down to check out that new bookstore over on 2nd ave? Lol I know you’re not much of a reader, but I heard there’s some cool stuff there. I guess it’d be a nice distraction from all the bad news.
Actually, yeah :( I’m headed downtown with a few of my friends.

I was thinking about some of the stuff you told me last week, with your phone and the notifications and...what was it? Sleep paralysis? It’s almost like you were anticipating this whole nightmare, isn’t it? Like since then I’ve been seeing articles and stuff about nightmares and sleep paralysis and it’s like actually creeping me the hell out.

I was thinking about some of the stuff you told me last week, with your phone and the notifications and...what was it? Sleep paralysis? It’s almost like you were anticipating this whole nightmare, isn’t it? Like since then I’ve been seeing articles and stuff about nightmares and sleep paralysis and it’s like actually creeping me the hell out.
Now that you mention, it’d be nice if we could talk through that again.

lol I just bumped into your friend Lawrence at Effy’s and he invited me to come with you guys to Dandelion. I don’t know, I mean he was kind of vague about why you were going, but he told me that the same thing happened to him that happened to you. I kinda wanna see what’s up - you don’t mind me coming along right?

lol I just bumped into your friend Lawrence at Effy’s and he invited me to come with you guys to Dandelion. I don’t know, I mean he was kind of vague about why you were going, but he told me that the same thing happened to him that happened to you. I kinda wanna see what’s up - you don’t mind me coming along right?
I mean it’ll probably be really boring, but if you’re really down...
I would’ve talked to you about it anyway - makes more sense for you to come along.
